thread.section_title: Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Grenelle Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great
thread.title_full: Great - Review of Mercure Paris Tour Eiffel Grenelle Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Sjabena
title: Great
text: This hotel was great, very close to the Eiffel Tower and easy access to other areas. Underground parking which is always nicer than an open street car park, although it will cost you 24 euros per night. The staff were extremely helpful and very pleasant. The room was lovely and the bathroom extremely clean. I would definitely recommend.
